entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ref safety broken with cast operators #71773
  • EditorConfig window will not save a file named .EditorConfig (PascalCase) #71772

Closed

  • False erorrs with generic interceptors #70311
    17.10
  • Language Service / Intellisense never recycles/reloads CodeGenerators #71771
  • IDE0290 (use primary constructor) code fixer produces invalid code #71749
  • Use C# 11 feature in my source code, but the build command: `dotnet build -p:langversion=10` built successfully. #71678
  • IDE0301 collection expression of `IList<>` causes performance degradation #71768
  • Analyze solution with WPF projects - MSBuildWorkspace #39359
    Backlog
  • MSBuildToolsPath points to AppContext.BaseDirectory, and not its true value #43863
    Backlog
  • No documents in projects #47419
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace throws exception on conditional package references #51027
    Backlog
  • Unable to open .net core projects due to invalid microsoft.build.framework dependency #40719
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Onboard C# Intellisense page to Unified Settings #71780
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable OSX queue #71778
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up the IntelliSense option pages #71777
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Another attempt at publishing bootstrap logs #71774
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature status #71769
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71767
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Razor internals #71762
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Make syntax generator handle ref struct correctly #71760
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2359645 #71763
  • Fix intercepting an instance method with a generic extension method #71658
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make tests explicit that they are in push-diagnostics mode #71775
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update source build version #71776
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Revert deadlock mitigation that causes other deadlocks #71713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Restore "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71687
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with 'use primary constructor' when an assignment uses a suppression operator #71751
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in 'convert to record' #71766
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify test code #71761
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Minor rename of internal property #71764
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update tests to be explicitly clear that they are testing push diagnostics. #71765
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add logging to track down a double dispose #71738
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix VSIX asset inclusion #71759
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add native lock feature #71716
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Make postfix `for` and `forr` snippets available for types with `Length` or `Count` property #71748
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Update code to use collection expressions #71591
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Only parse a single document when freezing documents with related linked files #71750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update our syntax list types to be "collection builder" types. #71646
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extract factory interface for AbstractSnippetExpansionClient #71752
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Fix rethrowing in nested async catch #71578
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Let the formatter format the whitespaces when converting an ArrowClauseExpression to a ReturnStatement when applicable #71757
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use ParamCollectionAttribute to mark params collections in metadata #71747
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Prefer converting to ReadOnlySpan for spread optimization when we do not need to write #71733
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support lexing razor comments #71697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not throw exceptions when we can't make a doc id #71451
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
